Articles.Content:
I'd love seeing some 0.625m and 1.875m parts with adapters, along with some inline and standalone 0.625/1.875 parts. I'd also love seeing some spacecraft parts, namely Soyuz reentry and utility modules.

parts for various types of racecars wouldn't hurt, either. I'm mostly referring to IndyCar and Formula 1 parts mostly, though Le Mans and NASCAR parts wouldn't be bad either. I've made a post that goes more into detail.

DISCLAIMER: I don't know how to create mods

Edited May 2 by Av8tor
